column4: Netflix uses DRM, something Novell Moonlight cannot use on Linux quite yet, and thus, it doesn't work on Linux. Explain your reasoning/method?
i just load firefox, and goto netflix.com and hit play and max my screen and it plays. and im using ubuntu 12.04
When I do that, I get an error that says you'll need a computer that has Windows, Mac, or Chrome OS.
I'm with ikonia, show us a screenshot, or it didn't happen.
